participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about food and art, with a love for exploring European cultures.
participant_1.background: i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Fashionable and outgoing, she enjoys keeping up appearances and indulging in pop culture.
participant_2.background: i diet a lot. i'm high maintenance. i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money.
